title: Cough Syrup: What We Know About Tainted Medicine from India
description: Tainted syrup from India may be connected to the deaths of dozens of children in Gambia, officials said. Indonesia banned cough syrup sales, though the link there is unclear.
dc:creator: Mike Ives
media:description: A notice at a pharmacy in Jakarta, Indonesia, on Thursday announcing that the sale of medicinal syrup had been halted.
